title: 2BR - 2BR - 9, 10, 11, 12 MONTH LEASE OPTIONS AVAILABLE..
posting_body: this third floor 2 bedroom apartment, in the heart of atlanta , is available for aug. sep.
and is located steps away from all the restaurants and shops.
includes all utilities (heat, electric, hot water, trash) and comes with two dedicated parking spots in the driveway for no extra monthly fee.
coin op laundry is in the basement along with extra storage if needed.
online application/lease process and rent payments!
animals older then 2 years old will be considered with a $50 non refundable per animal deposit and $10/month per pet rent.
